meanings.definition: Not connected or linked with something else.
meanings.sent1: The two trees in the field were nonassociated, standing alone.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the sky appeared nonassociated, each shining independently.
meanings.sent3: The nonassociated socks in the drawer seemed to have lost their partners.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like nonassociated puzzle pieces, scattered and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The nonassociated islands in the ocean created a beautiful, isolated landscape.

meanings.definition: Not having a formal or official relationship with a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: He was a nonassociated member of the club, not attending any meetings.
meanings.sent2: The freelance artist was nonassociated with any particular company.
meanings.sent3: The nonassociated cat wandered into the meeting, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like nonassociated planets, orbiting independently.
meanings.sent5: The nonassociated student stood out in the sea of uniformed classmates.
